text:
The Atlantic | Experienced Front End Developers | DC or NY | Onsite

We like build a fast news site to deliver world-class journalism. HTML/SASS/ES6/Gulp and we're getting into decoupled Express services, Service Workers, Design Systems, etc.

You can read about some of our work on our product blog. https://building.theatlantic.com/

Lead Front End Developer https://atlanticmedia.applytojob.com/apply/b6ZvfSoePV/Lead-F...

Senior Front End Developer https://atlanticmedia.applytojob.com/apply/EfTMcPw1rG/Senior...
